title.narrative: Project assessment for the exchange of know-how on climate change and water management in Ethiopia

description.narrative: The focus of the project to be developed is to be in the field of education and training of staff of the ministries responsible for water management (water supply and wastewater treatment) and agricultural irrigation in Ethiopia, regional and local administrations. Consideration of climate change impacts on water balance in the management of water resources in semi-arid areas is a significant aspect of this. A major thematic focus should be on imparting knowledge about appropriate technologies and their use. In addition to the education and training components, the project should also include an investment component in the form of pilot or demonstration plants. Emphasis should be placed on a sensible combination of both components with the aim of achieving the strongest possible multiplier effect with regard to the technologies used.
